title: Latitude Revenge
description: A medical thriller pitting a prominent urologist at a premier university medical center against a novel disease that explodes in outbreak fashion to cause infertility among male soldiers at two military bases near the nation's capital. Shortly after joining an investigative team assembled by the Pentagon, Wilbur Dunn, M.D. abruptly leaves the U.S. on a racing trimaran piloted by a young Portuguese woman who leads him to North Africa where he discovers not only the source of the illnesses but a heart-wrenching truth about his Native American identity.
author: Karl Klontz
